description: This file defines the AuthController class for an ASP.NET Core web API, handling user authentication endpoints such as registration and login.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: Controller handling authentication-related HTTP requests for user registration and login.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Handles user registration by creating a new account and returning a JWT token.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: Handles user login by validating credentials and returning a JWT token.
